dct_title_s: Bartholomew's four miles to the inch road map of England & Wales
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Shows main motoring and cycling routes, secondary motoring and cycling routes, other roads, railways, and county boundaries. Advertising for adjoining sheets on verso of map. Originally issued folded in covers 17 x 10 cm.
dct_publisher_sm: [Edinburgh] : Edinburgh Geographical Institute, John Bartholomew, & Co., [1897?] (London : W.H. Smith & Son)
